text: Doe's anyone know how to disable zooming on touch devices? HubSpot Hosted website but not built with code â€¦ I know how to do it in that case :slightly_smiling_face:
you should be able to edit the header in the template file right?
You may be able to add that same code in that section
I am overly frustrated when I can't zoom on a website
Agreed, I would recommend against disabling zooming for usability reasons
for example, someone with visual impairment on a tablet that needs to zoom in to see things would not be able to properly view the site then
I'm sure you can find 100 reasons why you want to prevent zooming, but it is a default action and users expect things to work as normal. Move their cheese and they get upset
